mdx.toptrumps.service

Interface GameService

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    GameServiceImpl

    public interface GameService
    Version:
    version 1.0 27 Jan 2015
    Author:
    martinellimi Description: GameService.java This interface contains methods to control the game.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      CardAnimalAttribute computerMove(CardAnimalModel card)
      Description: computerMode Decides which attribute the computer will 'play' against the other player and returns this attribute.
      UserModel evaluateMove(CardAnimalAttribute attr)
      Description: evaluateMove Evaluates the move, using comparable to compare the players cards, deciding the winner and the loser and the next player to start the move.
      void setWinner(UserModel user) 
      java.util.List<CardAnimalModel> startGame()
      Description: startGame Simply starts the game returning the list with all the cards and setting up the players.
